ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:52:21 [Issue ID 4000-40574] urn:comicvine:4000-40574 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 02:24:15. [Issue ID 40574]
ComicInfo.Summary: A weakened spawn is found by a young boy named Andy Frank. Andy manages (With the help of Spawns living chains) to pull Spawn to a shed in his backyard. Spawn then gets to meet the boy's older brother Eddie Frank, and learns about the boy's abusive father. Apparently the Father is a well respected citizen in the eyes of his town, but at home he's a drunken monster. Once spawn recovers, he leaves the Father with a message, and a few scars.
ComicInfo.Title: Father
